title: Pac-Man
description: Classic maze chase game with ghost AI and power-ups
author: jcaldwell-labs
controls_hint: Arrow Keys/WASD to move, ESC to quit
features: Classic maze layout with 240 pellets and 4 power pellets
4 ghost enemies with distinct AI personalities
BFS pathfinding for intelligent ghost behavior
Power-up system with escalating ghost points (200/400/800/1600)

ghost_ai.blinky: Direct chase - targets player's current position
ghost_ai.inky: Flanking - uses Blinky's position for complex targeting
ghost_ai.clyde: Shy - chases when far, retreats when close
